## ActionInterceptor interface

Represents a class for intercepting actions dispatched to the [Store](./state-management.store.md) in its provider scope. Provided with token [STORE\_ACTION\_INTERCEPTORS](./state-management.store_action_interceptors.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ActionInterceptor 
```
